metadata.name: Margaret Rodriguez

persona.name: Hannah Lee
persona.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
persona.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
persona.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

intent.name: General Greeting / Start Conversation
intent.description: A customer opens with a greeting or minimal context, requiring a clarifying question to route.
intent.goal: Determine whether they are a new sales lead or an existing customer needing support.

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

metadata.outcome: Callback scheduled and coverage verification requested.

turns.content: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to Comcast Business. What can I help you with today?

messages: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to Comcast Business. What can I help you with today?

turns.content: I’m coordinating an office move for our nonprofit next month and need to figure out moving our existing phone and internet service to a new address—and make sure the new location is actually covered. Can you help with that and also set up a callback time to go over details?
Sure thing—happy to help with the move. Could you share your first and last name so I can set up the callback?

messages: Sure thing—happy to help with the move. Could you share your first and last name so I can set up the callback?

turns.content: Thanks, Hannah. Just to confirm, this is for your nonprofit’s business location, right? What date, time, and timezone work best for a callback?

messages: Thanks, Hannah. Just to confirm, this is for your nonprofit’s business location, right? What date, time, and timezone work best for a callback?

turns.content:
Yes, it’s for our nonprofit’s office location.  

Ideally, I’d like a callback next Monday morning between 9–11 AM Eastern—any specific time in that window is fine, but earlier is better.
Great, you're all set for January 19, 2026, 9:00 AM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

messages: Great, you're all set for January 19, 2026, 9:00 AM ET. You'll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

turns.content:
One thing—I want to be sure our new address is actually serviceable before I rely on this. Can you at least confirm that Comcast Business covers 1420 Westfield Ave, Suite 300, Newark, NJ 07104, or will that be part of the callback?  

If you can’t check now, I’ll wait for the appointment, but I’ve had “surprise” coverage issues before and don’t want that happening again.
